Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: The venue has been used for various pop-up concepts but this review is for @burritoburt tacos and his cocktail wizard partner. The tacos are legit California mex style. He mixes it up with different meats/veggies and there‚Äôs always a plate ‚Ä¶

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: Best Mexican food in Amsterdam. Great cocktails and chill vibe!

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: Lovely lovely place! We had great food for a very affordable price, the bartender Nick was just the best bloke ever! Beers and shots were great and the music playlist was on point üòç ‚Ä¶

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: This place hosts cool events, pop up food, great cocktail selection, niche beers. The owner's specialty is Bloody Mary, for beer fans Two chef beers are delicious. ‚Ä¶

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: Love this place! Great vibe, great cocktail menu, all with premium brand and great price. Food selection is also great! Love the nugget selection, they are very addictive.

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: The cocktail menu is amazing, the food is great, the music and the atmosphere are awesome, and Nick is a top bloke! The prices are more than decent too! Highly recommend the place.

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text:
Cafe scrapyard tacos are amazeballs
Holy hell it‚Äôs good

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text:
Nice music, great decoration, very bad food.
I had a portobello burger with fries:
- the portobello mushroom was ridiculously small ‚Ä¶

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: Awesome place! Tasty (and very affordable) cocktails, nice vibe and great music selection! Will definitely come back :)

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: We came here in June during a 1 month trip around Europe. What a find! We stopped by twice after a long day walking the city. We had a great time trying the local beers and snacking on the baconaise fries. The bartender was a really cool dude from London. Thanks!

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: A great bar, really relaxed with the best cocktails in Amsterdam! We also had food and it was yummy. Very friendly nothing was too much trouble!!!

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: Yes, we were the guys who worked through the whole cocktail menu, they were all excellent, so why not!  A bit out of the way but we combined with a trip on a Mokum Boot so it was the perfect stop nearby to relax after that.

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: Hidden gem with quite possibly the best cocktails in Amsterdam. Owner is super friendly and the music selection is out of this world :)

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: Really tasty bbq! Ribs were good, chicken wings were fantastic and the Mac & Cheese with korean style meat was oh SO GOOD.   Wash it all down with a cocktail üçπüêªüëçüèº

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: Cool super friendly staff and good imperial stout, a good local neighbourhood bar... chatted up some random folks all of which were totally responsive and relaxed. ‚Ä¶

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: Ever changing chefs,  eve changing crazy cocktails,  cool art.  All over a great addition to Amsterdam.  Could use some better speakers though ;)

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: Cool place, nice selection of local craft beers and a menu of different gin & tonics, very laid back, very friendly staff, cool place for a few drinks with friends

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: Kind of a weird location but great spot inside! Nice folks, epic comfort food and drinks menu. Fried chicken sandwich was dope!

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: Nice entourage but I was very disappointed in the knowledge of the craft beers served. Was hoping for a nice experience with local beers but left with a sour taste.

Name: Scrapyard
Review Text: Nice and cozy cafe&bar to meet with friends and chill out. Friendly staff and a good cocktail menu!
